verses.text: Sing aloud \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w our|strong="H5921"\w* strength, shout \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Jacob.
\w Raise|strong="H7321"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* song, \w sound|strong="H7321"\w* \w the|strong="H7321"\w* timbrel, sweet lyre \w and|strong="H3290"\w* harp.

\w On|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* new moon blow \w the|strong="H5414"\w* horn, \w at|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* full moon, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* day \w of|strong="H5035"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* festival.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* statute \w for|strong="H3117"\w* Israel, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ruling \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Jacob,

\w a|strong="H3068"\w* witness \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w set|strong="H3478"\w* \w up|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Joseph, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* marched \w against|strong="H3290"\w* Egypt’s land, where \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* unknown voice \w say|strong="H3478"\w*:

“\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w removed|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* shoulder \w the|strong="H5921"\w* burden, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* freed \w your|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* basket.

\w At|strong="H3709"\w* \w your|strong="H5674"\w* call \w of|strong="H3709"\w* distress I \w delivered|strong="H5674"\w* \w you|strong="H3709"\w*, \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* thundercloud I answered \w you|strong="H3709"\w*. \w At|strong="H3709"\w* Meribah’s waters I tested \w you|strong="H3709"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*
“Listen, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* people, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* warning, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Israel, if \w you|strong="H5921"\w* would \w but|strong="H6030"\w* listen!

There \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H8085"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strange god \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w*, \w you|strong="H5971"\w* \w must|strong="H3478"\w* bow \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3478"\w* foreign god.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H2114"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* Egypt. Open \w your|strong="H3808"\w* mouth, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* fill \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

“\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* people \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* listen \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice, Israel \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* none \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w hard|strong="H5971"\w* hearts \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* follow \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* devices.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w* would listen, \w that|strong="H3820"\w* Israel would \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* ways.

Soon \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* humble \w their|strong="H8085"\w* enemies, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w turn|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* hand \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* foes.

\w Those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H6862"\w* hate \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w would|strong="H6862"\w* cringe \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* everlasting terror.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H8130"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6256"\w* feed \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* richest wheat, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* honey \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* rock \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* heart’s desire.”
